meanings.definition: Excessively talkative in a rambling, roundabout manner.
meanings.sent1: She is known for her garrulousness during meetings, often going off on tangents.
meanings.sent2: His garrulousness can be exhausting, as he never stops talking.
meanings.sent3: The garrulousness of the parrot entertained the guests at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her garrulousness was like a never-ending river of words flowing non-stop.
meanings.sent5: The garrulousness of the old man was as loud as a roaring waterfall.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being excessively talkative.
meanings.sent1: The garrulousness of the children filled the room with constant chatter.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't handle her garrulousness during the entire car ride.
meanings.sent3: The garrulousness of the radio host made the listeners chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His garrulousness was a storm of words that never seemed to end.
meanings.sent5: The garrulousness of the salesman was like a never-ending sales pitch.
